overview: No one talks about it but we have all thought about it. . . a Bisexual Fantasy. Some couples say a third wheel can be awkward when going out, but on a night in nothing brings these couples together like sharing a nice hard cock. Most husbands would be upset if they caught their wives cheating, but not Damien. He just wants a taste of that hard cock too! Ruckus and Leigh break into his old boss' house but when Chad catches them in the act he threatens to call the cops unless they both fuck him. Liv and her husband invite her boss Marcelo over to convince him to pay her more. He tells them no, not unless he can fuck them both.
title: Coming Out Bi 2
